title: ðŸš¨ Philadelphia Eagles hire Nick Sirianni - Emergency Podcast
description:
The Eagles are going back to Frank Reich, sort of. Jeffrey Lurie and Philadelphia plucked Colts OC Nick Sirianni from Indy to become their next head coach. On this emergency episode, Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and producer Deebo to get their thoughts on the move. The hire seemingly says a lot about the organization's belief in Carson Wentz and their focus on getting him fixed after a horrible 2020 season. What will the quarterback and the offense look like next season? The guys break down Sirianni's path to a head coaching gig and expectations with the Eagles before giving out a grade.
ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
